cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with the problem of multi-player bandits, which is a subfield of machine learning and game theory. The paper proposes a distributed algorithm for learning the matching between players and arms that achieves max-min fairness while minimizing the regret. This problem involves both learning and optimization, which are central topics in machine learning and game theory. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
